title: #261 - John Henson & ME
description:
John Henson and I hang out in the mancave and talk about what it was like to host Wipeout, starting comedy, Talk soup, writing on shows, and whether or not people got hurt on Wipeout.  

 

To donate to Georgia, Gabby, and Tatum’s goal of installing refillable water bottle stations in their middle school please go to http://www.gofundme.com/troop13376silveraward 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

To Follow me on..

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron. To get $30 off your first order go to https://www.blueapron.com/bertcast
